steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the location where you want to insert the superscript text.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Superscript' button.
Press the 'Enter' key to move to the next line.
Continue typing the rest of your document as needed.
Save the document when you're done.
